articles.title: Two taken to hospital after trailer topples over near Mount Faber
articles.content: The 32-year-old trailer driver and his passenger, a 29-year-old man, were taken conscious to hospital. The police said the driver is assisting with investigations. A lamp post is also knocked down. The Straits Times has contacted the Singapore Civil Defence Force and the Land Transport Authority for more details. Source: The Straits Times Â© SPH Media Limited. Permission required for reproduction
